getMessage

public java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String key, java.util.Locale locale)

getMessage

public java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String[] parameters, java.util.Locale locale)
Resolve the given code and arguments as message.
Parameters:
key - the key to lookup up, for example 'label.productId'
parameters - list of parameterss for a message
locale - Locale
Returns:
the resolved message, or message code if not found
